name: RecommendationActionType
type: enum
summary: ''
description: ''
codesamples: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
items:
  - name: AddReaction
    summary: |
      The user added a reaction to the item, such as a "like".
    value: 0
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: RemoveReaction
    summary: |
      The user removed a reaction from the item.
    value: 1
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Share
    summary: |
      The user shared the item.
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Report
    summary: |
      The user created an abuse report of the item.
    value: 3
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Comment
    summary: |
      The user commented on the item.
    value: 4
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Play
    summary: |
      The user joined an experience through the item, or played a mini-game
      associated with the item.
    value: 5
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Purchase
    summary: |
      The user made a purchase from the item.
    value: 6
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
